lead_paragraph: TOWERS--Richard, aka Richard Deutsch, on February 27, 2016. Beloved father of Joline Towers and David Skinner and brothers Donald Deutsch and Allan Deutsch. Loving uncle to Debra and Steve Garrin and Judith and Marvin Mattelson. Great- uncle to Eric (Alyssa), Michael, Todd and Liza. Longtime member and resident of Fountain House and the Actor's Home. Richard will be sorely missed and remain in our hearts forever. 1/3
